comment.author: 28693958@N00
comment._content: The caption is, hence the title should be, "Berry-Au-Bac". Thanks.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Berry-au-bac, France, was on the German western front line in 1915, a site of the First Battle of the Aisne in September, 1914, when trench warfare began. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/First_Battle_of_the_Aisne

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for noting the error and providing more information about the battle.  We'll make the changes the next time we update the record.

comment.author: 61501586@N05
comment._content: No Berry au Bec, but: Berry au Bac,N.W. of Paris, France .

comment.author: 61501586@N05
comment._content: North East of Paris ., no NW.
